website_summaries.verdict: Assassin's Creed III's joyous blend of parkour and storytelling is enthralling, even when technical issues threaten to derail the fun.
pros: Great storytelling that bridges two time periodsExciting sea battlesWatching your homestead come together provides a sense of progressLots of historical and visual details to admireVaried missions make good use of individual mechanics
cons: Far too many bugs and other technical issuesHunting is underdevelopedParkour and stealth inconsistencies

customer_reviews.title: Parents be aware! Great game for the WiiU
customer_reviews.text: Wanton violence in a historical backdrop dripping with atmosphere! What the heck else do you need? Seriously tho it is violent for younger kids. Language abounds. This is good on the Wii U . Lots of play time.
customer_reviews.author: OKintheStix

customer_reviews.title: Cool Details.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband who wanted to walk around in the colonial era in the game. He said he enjoyed it until he "accidentally" killed a character and then people in the game were chasing him. Made me laugh. Anyway, he thinks the details and game are very cool and he is definitely happy with it. We are not big gamers, but find this to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it
customer_reviews.text: Great game, frankly one of the best outside the fact that it glitches and it seems as if developers just gave up after a certain point as opposed to going all out in revelations or Assassin Creed 2
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good game...
customer_reviews.text: Heard I and II are better but they didn't come out for the WiiU at least for sale on Amazon. Love the graphics, sound is pretty good (background conversations get really repetitive but still funny). Game mechanics work well but take a little to get used to. Far better, IMO, than AC Black Flag...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Viescas

customer_reviews.title: Wii-U Improves ACIII Ten Fold
customer_reviews.text: As much as I hated ACIII, with Unity coming out I needed to play through AC1-Rogue in order, I had so many issues with ACIII on the PS3 that it was ridiculous, on the Wii-U however, it actually saves the game quite a lot though don't expect much else from the game outside of improved graphics, controls, and tech. If you get this game, get it for Wii-U, not for XBOX and ESPECIALLY not for PS3 because there are far more bugs and game breaking glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Braggaglorp

customer_reviews.title: It is worth playing
customer_reviews.text: I got this game because the price was right. I don't really like history, but this was somewhat interesting. I preferred to use the Wii U Pro controller over the Gamepad, because a lot of the time you would be riding a horse and it is just easier on your hands. I'm not really into Assassin's Creed so after the plot was over I stopped playing it. The ending left me with kind of an empty feeling and it doesn't feel satisfying to the plot. It was worth playing though.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic!! I couldn't stop playing it! The setting is by far tye best part about this game I loved it! The combat was great! Its so much fun!. If your wondering how the wii u gamepad is used its really just used for a map. But i wont complain! It made the gane so much more cinematic!. If your on the fence about buying this trust me you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Having played ACII on PS3, I upgraded and purchased AC III on Wii U. The graphics are better and the story is even more interesting this time. Off TV Play works wonders. It is also much more convenient to have the map on the game pad than the little circle on the right bottom corner in AC II. The gameplay itself is similar, with same mechanics of movement and assassination. Fits nicely on Wii U and I will recommend this game. It has the DLC and Wii U also getting AC IV. Ubisoft has been supportive of Wii U, nicely complementing Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Arzon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game and it was brand new. We haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some Glitches but Highly Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome story line, side missions, exploration, graphic details but the game play has many glitches especially during & after battles of 5 or more opponents. I often find myself leaving afterward with a bayonet rifle sticking out of you or simply to you...when I hit leave the omnibus then return it corrects itself thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: StudioKES

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Part of our extensive Assassin's Creed collection, this is a classic and highly enjoyable game. Our daughter often chooses this above other games to play and has yet to tire of it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good game. makes a good addition to the assassins creed collection.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game but I like the Black Flag better. I could be biased because i like pirate stuff. This game still kept me busy and playing for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: TheCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: For people who enjoy stealth and action.
customer_reviews.text: Assassin's creed 3 is a good addition to the series, the story is the thing that you look into the most, gameplay is well, and world is fun to explore. A good game to get for the wii u, considering it is useful to use the touchpad and the map onto the screen of the controller. Also, if your tv is being used by someone else, don't worry! You can play the game on the controller! Pretty cool right?
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best Assassin's Creed yet. I've always played them on the 360, but I was insanely excited when they announced the this game for the Wii U. I highly recommend getting this game.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: a great game with a bit of history
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my son. he really enjoys playing this and black flag, he also likes the fact that there is real history in the game and has told his teachers what he "learned" about the historical figures while playing.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Disc
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the disc was too scratched to even start the main menu options.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: So glad this came out on Wii-U so I could try this series!
customer_reviews.text: I have put 5 or so hours into the game at this point. I'm not an avid hardcore gamer but I love the way this game looks and plays. It is really beautiful. I haven't tried the multiplayer yet but plan on it soon. Once I get a little farther in I can elaborate, but it's definitely a joy thus far from a beauty and fun factor perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Not such a great AC or disk :(
customer_reviews.text: OK game, nothing near Black Flag but the only other in the AC series available for WiiU. The disk looked in perfect condition but it skips and makes a lot of noise. Luckily I don't care too much about the game and it was super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Briana S

customer_reviews.title: A fun game
customer_reviews.text: The copy of Assassin's Creed III that I got from Amazon was used and tend to freeze or glitch. Otherwise, this is a fun game and has a complicated storyline. I am enjoying the game so far and would recommend to anyone interested in the Assassin's Creed series.
customer_reviews.author: TaGenuis

customer_reviews.title: A very tedious and boring game for the Assassin's Creed series
customer_reviews.text: A very tedious and boring game for the Assassin's Creed series. Assassinations take a back seat to the history segments of this game to the point where it feels like Assassinations are just not what the game is after.
customer_reviews.author: James Ozmar

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Creative game
customer_reviews.text: Addicting with a very creative story line and an interesting view of American history. If you like History and challenges involving deception and strategy you will like this one. Graphics are pretty good, on par with SkyRim.
customer_reviews.author: T. Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: as per usual Amazon shipped it to me earlier than it's projection, and the product was in great shape just like in store. very in depth story, great game play mechanics. Naval battles are challenging yet fun.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Immersive story, beautiful graphics, enjoyable gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Immersive story, beautiful graphics, enjoyable gameplay. One of the best titles for the Wii U, if you like cinematic games you won't regret it, besides the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Camilo Jiménez

customer_reviews.title: The best game I've Played
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, the game was a little tough. But the scenes where amazing. My suggestion is to play all the side missions as the game progresses not just the main missions. Love the history lessons too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awsome game. It was a great story line. I never had played any of the other games and i was able to play without a problem. You figure out whats going on by the end of the opening movie. The multi-player online is fun as well. I highly recommend this game for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WDfanatic

customer_reviews.title: You have to be patient with this game,
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, I didn't mind the story heavy nature of this game because I liked the story and especially the music. I don't think Connor is "boring". The gameplay is very easy but fun and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good game
customer_reviews.text: Every Assassin's Creed is great in it's own way. I didn't care too much for this time period and so it got pretty stale after awhile. It is completely up to preference but it is still fun to play. If you get a good deal, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: sTeaLth

customer_reviews.title: Great game, even better on Wii U
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed all the Assassin's Creed games, and this one's no exception. The Wii U enhancements are minor, but the larger map is actually very handy, and off-screen play and the Miiverse community are great features as usual.
customer_reviews.author: penduin

customer_reviews.title: Best played on WiiU in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Okay game. Best played on WiiU in my opinion, but game is just alright.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: The sailing parts are the best. The jumping through trees parts are the worst
customer_reviews.text: The sailing parts are the best. The jumping through trees parts are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just put this game in, and even on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put this game in, and even on the 5th try all it will do is freeze my brand new Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: Roundedhydra

customer_reviews.title: awesome game great gameplay
customer_reviews.text: This game was a purchase for my boyfriend and I must say I am not a gamer but enjoy watching the stunning imagery of this game on the Wii U
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i acttually enjoy the gam, but the bugs, is umplayable at some points
customer_reviews.author: Powertechreview

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: After getting used to the controls and getting the WiiU Pro Game pad, it is a great game. Get the Pro Pad!
customer_reviews.author: N. Wrzinski

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. It is a cross between grand theft auto, spider man, and mafia. I love the story plot and the graphics are amazing. I am still playing this game and every new adventure, adds new things to do. Sailing a ship, riding horses, and hunting animals in the frontier. Tons of fun and addicting. Also you have option to play little side missions vs the main mission.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew West

customer_reviews.title: 100% pleased with this game.
customer_reviews.text: This one is my first Assassin's Creed for WiiU, I have Assassin's Creed I, II, Brotherhood, Reveletaion and III for PS3 (Yes, i have 2 time Assassin's Creed III) and now complete my collection with this one over the Nintendo System. As always, great story, excelent controls. In 2 words, MAGNIFICENT GAME.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez Monzon Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Ok game
customer_reviews.text: I had fun playing it for about 3 hours, after that it just became a burden. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Kind of clunky on the Wii U.
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says - it feels clunky on the Wii U system. It's a really fun game, though! I previously owned it on the PC.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Finally, quality adult gaming on the Wii U.
customer_reviews.text: Great HD game for adults on the Wii U platform. Great graphics with a complex and intriguing story line. Buy this game.
customer_reviews.author: Stickvader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the gameplay. They include historical refrences throughout the game
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely awesome!! I had no problem with the game it ran very smoothly. The plot was okay but still it was a great game and I do not regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Hibiscus

customer_reviews.title: Good price, bought before they disappear this is now ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price, bought before they disappear this is now an older game but I have no system to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry See

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game, but it has some bugs that need fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... no scratch on the disc and the game is amazing although connor has no emotion when he speaks the ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes this legitimately surprised me I thought it would be all scratched but no I have seen no scratch on the disc and the game is amazing although connor has no emotion when he speaks the open world exploration is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage kids love, I think it looks like a lot of fun if I had time to play it. The graphics are fantastic and the gameplay seems smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying this game
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking game, the violence is not the worst, we really like the scaling buildings and leaping from roof to roof. I let my 8 year old son play with me, he enjoys the game, and we talk about violence and when it is okay and not okay. However there is a fair amount of reading required with sometimes small print, I haven't finished the game yet but I enjoyed some of the history of the American Colonies and the Native Peoples I feel were depicted rather well, not to glorified or charactured. It is a video game so harder to give great depth to characters but they did okay.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love the  game
customer_reviews.text: I love the game and I can't wait to finish it and get IV. The graphics are pretty decent and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod De Defi

customer_reviews.title: AC3
customer_reviews.text: For those who play PS3 games will greatly appreciate this game. My daughter now has the WII U game and will play with joy.
customer_reviews.author: My Precious Tia

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift and my son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My s on wanted this for his birthday and it arrived right on time and he's loving it. My son and i would recommend this to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Redheadedsandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It was in perfect condition both the package and the product. I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good game
customer_reviews.text: this game is as good as predicted. It is kinda slow, so if you just want to shoot and shoot this may not be the game for you. not for kids in other words.
customer_reviews.author: hardworkworthdoing

customer_reviews.title: hard to play for novice
customer_reviews.text: couldnt get into game, liked the story line but if you haven't played one before its tough to learn. just okay
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ortloff

customer_reviews.title: Dind't work
customer_reviews.text: Now a days the game industry focus less and less in software quality. The disk keeps showing error:150 1031 when I play, something to do with a damage or dirty disc, with a brand new disc for god sakes!!, the forums shows that's an error a little to much common with some Wii U games but, AC3 win the award with that, my advice?, buy it on a store so if the problem show up it will be easier to exchange the game.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ive been playing this on my kids Wii U and ut has great detail. The story is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Covil

customer_reviews.title: Starts out slow
customer_reviews.text: It really starts out slow and sort of boring with the plot.... don't get me wrong the new mechanics are great but you spend too much time on the first part of the story that is fairly linear when suddenly it opens up and you get an endless barrage of sidequests that are fun and interesting. The bits of american history are a nice refreshing change from the european and eastern setting of the past games, I believe that if the franchise didn't do this game then that could have been the end of it. AC 3 Reveleations whats a bit plain and sort of more of the same formula, but here Ubisoft has changed its formula.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: came in faster than I thought and it was brand new and still wrapped, can't beat that for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love this game.... it a shame that ubisoft is not going to develop more games to Wii U
customer_reviews.author: rudycas

customer_reviews.title: reliable store
customer_reviews.text: They were prompt in sending the game was well and are very good recommended presintado
customer_reviews.author: erich

customer_reviews.title: Best Assassins Creed game
customer_reviews.text: This game is like its ps3, xbox 360, and pc versions. It is a great game to play and is my favorite out of the series. My only cons are some glitches like one part of the game the mouth doesn't move when the charterer's voice is talking.
customer_reviews.author: Squall

customer_reviews.title: If you own a WII U, its time you ...
customer_reviews.text: If you own a WII U, its time you get this game. Visual effects and gameplay will definately get your attention !
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Martise

customer_reviews.title: Wii U Off Screen Play!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the fact that the Wii U version supports off-screen makes this the DEFINITIVE version of this game. Really awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product and I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and I love it. But I don't like the beginning. It's kinda slow but it can be pretty fun at times.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Corey

customer_reviews.title: good game
customer_reviews.text: only problems this game has on wii u is that it freezes sometimes, but thats rarely. otherwise its a good game. 7/10
customer_reviews.author: Carlos/Claudia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work I have berely put the game in and it just froze
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best games of the franchise, and the multiplayer is the same as always, but it's really fun. It really integrates the Gamepad features.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ignacio Cifuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, not as violent as Call Of Duty Black Ops II.
customer_reviews.author: AndresB

customer_reviews.title: AC3
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal. I would recommend this game to just about anyone who loves RPGs and who love American History amazing and wow!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is a awesome game. incredible graphics and game playing. nice history and other small activities. recommend this game to all.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: this was one of my favorite games to play. i never get bored playing it. cool game on the wii u
customer_reviews.author: adrian adrian

customer_reviews.title: Very good game.
customer_reviews.text: I love this game there is so much to do and I love the combat and story line. My only complaint is that it is nearly impossible to get into a game of multiplayer now a days.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my teenager entertained
customer_reviews.text: My teenager loves this game. He loves the challenge. This game is definitely for at least a teenager but the graphics are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Typical Assassins Creed game, story, bland and confusing, if you aren't paying attention. Same Mechanics.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lujan

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: it's a great game. the only one thing i found is that you should play alone, would be great if they could integrate another person to play in groups
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: game can get very boring but i love the multiplayer
customer_reviews.author: Betty Zirate

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: The game is very fun and the graphics look pretty awesome. This was the first time I played AC and the gameplay was very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and the young lady who I purchased it for, loves this game.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: great game and price
customer_reviews.text: love this game had it for xbox and now i have it for wii u and i got it for only 33 $ loving it
customer_reviews.author: hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Really great game packed good excellent price love it and recommend it to others looking to buy this game . :)
customer_reviews.author: eddie bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good History...
customer_reviews.text: The history is fascinating and I enjoy the storyline. The actual game play is lacking a bit and the graphics are not at all what you should be getting out of a Wii U title!
customer_reviews.author: KevD

customer_reviews.title: Great game for wiiu
customer_reviews.text: Best version of the game in my opinion, you can even play exclusively on the gamepad if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 3A Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Though the game is technically incredible the rest just doesn't add up. The protagonist is dull and underdeveloped, the cast of characters are uninteresting, you'll never face any challenge, a lot of dumb fetch quests. The only truly good thing about the game is the naval combat that's is by far the best made on any game, other then that be prepared for around 50+hours of collecting bird feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The game freezes the wii U. It's probably something with the disc I bought since all my games work fine, but this one. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: walisson cardoso gomes

customer_reviews.title: Game does not work and freezes up system
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this through Amazon because it was cheaper than stores and i had never played this style game. HOwever every time i have put it in my BRAND NEW {less than a week old} Wii U, it freezes up and i have to reboot the system.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mays

customer_reviews.title: A bit boring
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are not that good. Its more like a movie, with controlling the character less than 30% of the time. During the narrative there are many graphics problems. Franklins head comes off his body several times, very funny. Characters are doing things when nothing is there to do it to. It seems such a down grade come pared to other games. Story line is interesting, only reason I'm continuing it. I wanted more play.
customer_reviews.author: kevin b

customer_reviews.title: It's fun, but not the best on the series
customer_reviews.text: Game play is fun, and is a great way to put your new Wii U to the test It is not the best game of the series, and unless you have played the others, you probably won't be crazy about the story The ending is dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Too much bugs
customer_reviews.text: Its a very compete game, the history mode its extense and has nice sidequests that takes time, so the game long, the gameplay its easy to handle. but... its has too many bugs that made my WiiU crash a few times. besides that its a great game..
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Way too cinematic.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if I didn't know better, I'd think this was a movie with video game mechanics thrown in. It's understandable that they had a story to tell, but the gameplay is unforgivable. I can't recall off the top of my head anything I could consider a "boss fight". In fact, the final "boss" involved no fighting whatsoever and mainly took place in cut-scenes. In between those cut-scenes all the player could do is make the character walk.Slowly. While there were fun times to be had, the game really isn't worth the price. If you want to play a game that involves stealth on the Wii U, then buy Batman: Arkham City.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Face

customer_reviews.title: Decent game, poor story
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough gameplay but the story... Oh the story for this one. The main character is simply flat and angry for reasons that seem to defy logic considering there's a decent set up. You might want to consider reading the Wikipedia entry for this one and skipping straight to IV
customer_reviews.author: Chris Macholtz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I enjoy playing it more on the Wii u than in other consoles because of the features the Wii u gamepad controller offers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Jrez

customer_reviews.title: Game play and storyline is good....
customer_reviews.text: The game play and storyline is great. It sometimes gets difficult to follow the story and your next objectives but overall is a fun game to play.
customer_reviews.author: rcpitts

customer_reviews.title: First Time Player
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing, I've never played an AC game. I have however witnessed how fun it is to play online. You don't need a new copy to play online. Buy this used. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Aamirica

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics...FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten too far into this game yet but so far I have been very impressed. The controls are very intuitive and easy to use. Since it is a multi-system game it doesn't utilize the Wii U gamepad as other games but good nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: very nice I recommend it, lots of fun, my son loves this game and I have to complete 3 more words, done!!
customer_reviews.text: very nice I recommend it, lots of fun, my son loves this game and I have to complete 3 more words, done!!

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and killing game it have what funny is that everything or everyone need to die some how, I like it
customer_reviews.author: Arnulfo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful game. It's more like watching a movie than playing a game though because there are a whole lot of cut scenes. Depends on what kind of games you like, but it can teach you a little bit about history as you play I guess. haha
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not really my type of game.
customer_reviews.text: I have not played any assassins creed game much, this one seems to bore me, but it's because I guess I really don't like the series.
customer_reviews.author: ACEadams

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to play as the Native American pictured on ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to play as the Native American pictured on the box, not as a snob! I won't spoil who the other playable character is...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Owen Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Woderfully Indepth
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play! It will take a while to complete the game with all the optional games and side challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little game with a huge price tag. great graphics and no education. Just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mad_Dog

product_meta.title: Assassin's Creed III - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description:
Platform:Nintendo WiiU| Edition:StandardThe American Colonies, 1775: It's a time of civil unrest and political upheaval in the Americas. As a Native American assassin fights to protect his land and his people, he will ignite the flames of a young nation's revolution. Assassin's Creed III takes you back to the American Revolutionary War, but not the one you've read about in history books. *DLC (Downloadable Content) may not be included and is not guaranteed to work*

AMAZON.COM
 



IGNITE THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION
The American Colonies, 1775. It’s a time of civil unrest and political upheaval in the Americas. As a Native American assassin fights to protect his land and his people, he will ignite the flames of a young nation’s revolution. 

Assassin’s Creed III takes you back to the American Revolutionary War, but not the one you’ve read about in history books.

CRITICAL ACCLAIM
OVER 60 E3 NOMINATIONS AND AWARDS
KEY GAME FEATURES
 * As a Native American assassin, eliminate your enemies with guns, bows, tomahawks, and more!
 * 
 * From bustling city streets to the chaotic battlefields, play a critical role in the most legendary events of the American Revolution including the Battle of Bunker Hill and Great Fire of New York.
 * 
 * Experience the truth behind the most gruesome war in history: the American Revolution.
 * 
 * Introducing the Anvil Next game engine, the stunning new technology that will revolutionize gaming with powerful graphics, lifelike animations, immersive combat, and advanced physics.
feature_bullets: As a Native American assassin, eliminate your enemies with guns, bows, tomahawks, and more!
From bustling city streets to the chaotic battlefields, play a critical role in the most legendary events of the American Revolution including the Battle of Bunker Hill and Great Fire of New York
Introducing the Ubisoft-AnvilNext game engine, the stunning new technology that will revolutionize gaming with powerful graphics, lifelike animations, immersive combat, and advanced physics

Gain quick access to two major pillars of Assassin s Creed with the Wii U GamePad, always know where your enemies are with a larger and more expansive overhead map at your fingertips, and once the fight begins, easily change your weapons with the on-screen touch controls!
